org.esupportail.commons.services.smtp
Interface SmtpService

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSmtpService, AsynchronousSmtpServiceImpl, SimpleSmtpServiceImpl, VoidSmtpServiceImpl
public interface SmtpService
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of SMTP services, used to send emails.
